H0.text: who dies in transformers revenge of the fallen. Optimus Prime

H1.text: who dies in transformers revenge of the fallen. Megatron

H2.text: who dies in transformers revenge of the fallen. Bumblebee

H3.text: who dies in transformers revenge of the fallen. Jetfire

A4.text: Jetfire sacrifices himself to give Optimus his parts

A5.text: Optimus appears dead but is then seen sneaking up towards the Allspark

A6.text: his lifeless body presumably buried to honor his services
